parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the text within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh-CN**: Chinese
*   **en-US**: English

> The default value is **en-US**.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DbInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description:
The database engine of the database.

> Only MySQL is supported.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return. Valid values: any non-zero positive integer.

> The default value is 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute operation to query the region ID.
